item.title: Creating Python extensions in Rust using PyO3
item.description: This post describes how I approached writing a Python extension in Rust. The post covers: why one would even want to do this ðŸ™ƒ the approaches for calling Rust code from Python an overview of how to create a Python module in Rust using PyO3 some tricky parts, e.g. inheritance building and distributing wheels Let’s get started. First, why do this at all? There are two main reasons:
